QuestData.Title: Swallowed Whole
QuestData.Description: Now, back to your dilemma.$b$bI believe you can help your people build relations with our hozen, as my people have.$b$bThe trail behind me will lead you to a body of water the hozen use to gather the fish that feeds them.$b$bAround this time every year, fearsome beasts call those waters home and many hungry hozen are lost to them.$b$bIf you were to rescue some of the victims and gather some fish, perhaps you will be regarded more favorably.
QuestData.LogDescription: Free 5 hozen from the Engorged Crocolisks, and gather 5 Speckled Trout from Lake Kittitata.
